summary: Unlock all or individual perk trees with text files
descriptionHtml:
The zip file contains text files to unlock all perks, or individual perk trees or specializations (magic perks, combat perks, stealth perks).  Extract whatever ones you want into your skyrim installation directory (the folder with the TESV.exe in it).

While ingame, type:
bat [filename]

replace \'[filename]\' with the name of textfile you want to use.  For example:
bat unlockonehanded

will unlock all perks for the one-handed perk tree.
author: philman401
